name: Unguntrollable
description:
Unguntrollable is a simple top-down arcade shooter/bullet hell where you fight your own gun as much as you fight your enemies, made for the GMTKJam2020.

Your gun is always firing and knocks you back. Every few seconds, more enemies will spawn, the background will change color and your weapon will change types. On the top left corner you see the timer for the next change, on the top right corner is the time you've been alive, on the bottom right corner is your highest time, health is on the bottom left corner.
